name: barkoder-nativescript
description: Nativescript support for Barkoder - a Barcode Scanner SDK for the modern enterprise.

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm i && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm i && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove barkoder-nativescript && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove barkoder-nativescript && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npm run demo-angular.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i

author: barkoder <admin@barkoder> (https://barkoder.com)
